          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_setpoint_window

      ViStatus TP04310_read_setpoint_window (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                             ViPReal64 setpointWindow);

  Purpose

      This function allows to querry the setpoint window.

      Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

      Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from the
      temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.



  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointWindow

          Variable Type       ViReal64 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the currently selected setpoint's temperature
          window.

          Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

          Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from
          the temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_SRE

      ViStatus TP04310_read_SRE (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                 ViPInt16 SRE_register);

  Purpose

      This function reads the service request enable (mask) register.

      Valid Range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - not used, always 0
      bit 1 - not used, always 0
      bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
      bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
      bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
      bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
      bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
      bit 7 - ready


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      SRE_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the service request enable (mask) register.

          Valid Range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - not used, always 0
          bit 1 - not used, always 0
          bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
          bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
          bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
          bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
          bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
          bit 7 - ready


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_STB

      ViStatus TP04310_read_STB (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                 ViPInt16 statusByte);

  Purpose

      This function reads the status byte (STB).

      Valid Range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - not used, always 0
      bit 1 - not used, always 0
      bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
      bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
      bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
      bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
      bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
      bit 7 - ready


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      statusByte

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the status byte (STB).

          Valid Range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - not used, always 0
          bit 1 - not used, always 0
          bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
          bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
          bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
          bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
          bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
          bit 7 - ready


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_TECR

      ViStatus TP04310_read_TECR (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                  ViPInt16 TECRRegister);

  Purpose

      This function reads the temperature event condition register (TECR).

      Valid range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
      bit 1 - not at temperature
      bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
      bit 3 - end of one cycle
      bit 4 - end of all cycles
      bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
      bit 6 - not used
      bit 7 - reserved


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      TECRRegister

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the temperature event condition register (TECR).

          Valid range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
          bit 1 - not at temperature
          bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
          bit 3 - end of one cycle
          bit 4 - end of all cycles
          bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
          bit 6 - not used
          bit 7 - reserved


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_TESE

      ViStatus TP04310_read_TESE (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                  ViPInt16 TESE_register);

  Purpose

      This function reads the temperature event status enable (mask) register.

      Valid Range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
      bit 1 - not at temperature
      bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
      bit 3 - end of one cycle
      bit 4 - end of all cycles
      bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
      bit 6 - not used
      bit 7 - reserved


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      TESE_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the temperature event status enable (mask)
          register.

          Valid Range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
          bit 1 - not at temperature
          bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
          bit 3 - end of one cycle
          bit 4 - end of all cycles
          bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
          bit 6 - not used
          bit 7 - reserved


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_read_TESR

      ViStatus TP04310_read_TESR (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                  ViPInt16 TESR_register);

  Purpose

      This function reads the temperature event status register (TESR).

      Note: The bits in this register are latched. They are set when the
      corresponding bit in the temperature event condition register (TECR)
      makes a 0 to 1 transition, and are cleared when the TESR is read.

      Valid range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
      bit 1 - not at temperature
      bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
      bit 3 - end of one cycle
      bit 4 - end of all cycles
      bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
      bit 6 - not used
      bit 7 - reserved


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      TESR_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control returns the temperature event status register.

          Valid range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
          bit 1 - not at temperature
          bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
          bit 3 - end of one cycle
          bit 4 - end of all cycles
          bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
          bit 6 - not used
          bit 7 - reserved


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_readInstrData

      ViStatus TP04310_readInstrData (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                      ViInt32 numberBytesToRead,
                                      ViChar _VI_FAR readBuffer[],
                                      ViPInt32 numBytesRead);

  Purpose

      This function reads data from the instrument's output buffer and returns
      it to the specified variable in memory.

      Notes:

      (1) Because the instrument may return both numeric and text data in
      response to queries this function returns the data in string format.

      (2) If valid data is not available at the instrument's output buffer when
      this function is called the instrument will hang up and the function will
      not return until it times out.  If the time-out is disabled this function
      will hang indefinitely and it may be necessary to reboot the computer to
      break out.

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      numberBytesToRead

          Variable Type       ViInt32

          The number of bytes specified by this control should be greater than
          or equal to the number of bytes which are to be read from the
          instrument. If the actual number of bytes to be read is greater than
          the number this control specifies then multiple reads will be
          required to empty the instrument's output buffer.

          If the instrument's output buffer is not emptied the instrument may
          return invalid data when future reads are performed.

          Default Value:  50 (See NOTE 2)

          Notes:

          (1) If NO DATA is available at the instrument's output buffer when
          this function is called the instrument will hang up and the function
          will not return until it times out.  If the time-out is disabled,
          this function will hang indefinitely and it may be necessary to
          reboot the computer.

          (2) If the number of bytes expected is greater than 50 the value of
          this control may be increased. If the actual number of bytes read is
          larger than the declared size of the read buffer a run-time error
          will be generated.


      readBuffer

          Variable Type       ViChar[]

          The incoming data from the instrument is placed into this variable.

          Notes:

          (1) Because the instrument may return both numeric and text data in
          response to queries this function returns the data in string format.

          (2) This function does not overwrite any old data left in the string
          variable from the last time the function was called. String data in
          LabWindows/CVI is terminated with an ASCII null(0x0) and string
          manipulation functions will only recognize data before the ASCII
          null.

          (3) The declared size of the string variable must be greater than the
          actual number of bytes read from the instrument if it is not a
          run-time error will be generated.


      numBytesRead

          Variable Type       ViInt32 (passed by reference)

          This variable contains the actual number of bytes read from the
          instrument. This is the value which is returned by the read function.

          Notes:

          (1) If the actual number of bytes read is less than the number of
          bytes specified in the Number Bytes To Read control then the output
          buffer has probably been emptied. If the read function fails and the
          number of bytes read is 0, the most probable cause for the failure is
          there was no data available at the instrument's output buffer.

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_reset

      ViStatus TP04310_reset (ViSession instrumentHandle);

  Purpose

      This function resets the instrument to the Cycle screen. Any
      device-specific errors, the uppper and lower temperature limits are
      reset. System switches to the air mode and sets the test time to 0(zero)
      seconds. If the system was cycling or controlling at  temperature, the
      air flow shuts off and cycling is interrupted. Setpoint number 5 becomes
      the selected setpoint.

      Note: After sending this command, wait 4 seconds before sending another
      command

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_reset_op_screen

      ViStatus TP04310_reset_op_screen (ViSession instrumentHandle);

  Purpose

      This function resets the instrument to the Operator screen. Any
      device-specific errors, the uppper and lower temperature limits are
      reset. System switches to the air mode and sets the test time to 0(zero)
      seconds. If the system was cycling or controlling at  temperature, the
      air flow shuts off and cycling is interrupted. Setpoint number 5 becomes
      the selected setpoint.

      Note: After sending this command, wait 4 seconds before sending another
      command

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_revisionQuery

      ViStatus TP04310_revisionQuery (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                      ViChar _VI_FAR instrumentDriverRevision[],
                                      ViChar _VI_FAR firmwareRevision[]);

  Purpose

      This function returns the revision numbers of the instrument driver and
      instrument firmware, and tells the user with which  instrument firmware
      this revision of the driver is compatible.



  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      instrumentDriverRevision

          Variable Type       ViChar[]

          This control returns the Instrument Driver Software Revision.

          Notes:

          (1) The array must contain at least 256 elements ViChar[256].

      firmwareRevision

          Variable Type       ViChar[]

          This control returns the Instrument Firmware Revision.

          Notes:

          (1) The array must contain at least 256 elements ViChar[256].

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0105  Revision Query not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_REV_QUERY
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_save_setup

      ViStatus TP04310_save_setup (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                   ViInt16 setupFile);

  Purpose

      This function saves the current values of the test parameters to the
      setup file from 1 to 12 as in Setup File Name control.


      Note: After sending this command, wait 2 seconds before sending another
      command.

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setupFile

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control specifies the setup file number 1 to 12 to save the
          current values of the test parameters to.


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_selfTest

      ViStatus TP04310_selfTest (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                 ViPInt16 selfTestResult,
                                 ViChar _VI_FAR selfTestMessage[]);

  Purpose

      This function runs the instrument's self test routine and returns the
      test result(s).

      /**** DELETE THIS NOTE AND THE STATUS CODE IF SUPPORTED *****/
      Notes:

      (1) If this instrument does not support a Self-Test, this function should
      return the Warning Code 0x3FFC0103 - VI_WARN_NSUP_SELF_TEST

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      selfTestResult

          Variable Type       ViInt16 (passed by reference)

          This control contains the value returned from the instrument self
          test.  Zero means success.  For any other code, see the device's
          operator's manual.


      selfTestMessage

          Variable Type       ViChar[]

          This control contains the string returned from the self test. See the
          device's operation manual for an explanation of the string's
          contents.

          Notes:

          (1) The array must contain at least 256 elements ViChar[256].

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0103  Self Test not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_SELF_TEST
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_config_parameter

      ViStatus TP04310_write_config_parameter (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                               ViInt16 configurationParameterID,
                                               ViInt16 configurationParameterValue);

  Purpose

      This function writes a configuration parameter to the TP04300 instrument.

      The following Configuration Parameter IDs are allowed:

      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_NONE] - a default parameter configures
                                    nothing
      /*============================================================*/

      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_CYCLE_COUNT] - used to configure the number of
      cycles

      Configuration Parameter Value: his control accepts the cycle count to set
      the desired number of cycles to run.

      Default Value:  1

      Valid Range: 1-9999

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_SHUTDOWN_TIMER] - used to configure the shutdown
      timer in minutes. Set to 0 to disable shutdown timer.

      Default Value:  0

      Valid Range: 0-1000

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_TEST_TIME] - used to configure the test time in
      seconds.

      Default Value:  0

      Valid Range: 0-9999

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_SENSOR_TYPE] - used to configure the DUT sensor
      type.

      0 - no DUT sensor is selected, air mode
      1 - T-Type thermocouple, DUT mode
      0 - K-Type thermocouple, DUT mode

      Default Value:  0

      Valid Range: 0-2

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_THERMAL_CONSTANT] - used to configure the DUT
      thermal constant parameter.

      Default Value:  100

      Valid Range: 20-500

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_MODE] - used to configure the DUT mode. 0 for
      Air mode; 1 for DUT mode

      Default Value:  0

      Valid Range: 0-1

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_LOW_TEMP_LIMIT] - used to configure the lower
      temperature limit

      Default Value:  -99

      Valid Range: -99 - +25

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_HIGH_TEMP_LIMIT] - used to configure the upper
      temperature limit

      Default Value:  225

      Valid Range: 25 - 225

      /*============================================================*/
      [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_TO_DUT_MAX_DIFFERENCE] - used to configure the
      maximum allowable difference between the air and DUT temperatures.

      Default Value:  300

      Valid Range: 10 - 300

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      configurationParameterID

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          The following Configuration Parameter IDs are allowed:

          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_NONE] - a default parameter configures
                                        nothing
          /*============================================================*/

          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_CYCLE_COUNT] - used to configure the number of
          cycles.

          Configuration Parameter Value: his control accepts the cycle count to
          set the desired number of cycles to run.

          Default Value:  1

          Valid Range: 1-9999

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_SHUTDOWN_TIMER] - used to configure the
          shutdown timer in minutes. Set to 0 to disable shutdown timer.

          Default Value:  0

          Valid Range: 0-1000

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_TEST_TIME] - used to configure the test time in
          seconds.

          Default Value:  0

          Valid Range: 0-9999

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_SENSOR_TYPE] - used to configure the DUT
          sensor type.

          0 - no DUT sensor is selected, air mode
          1 - T-Type thermocouple, DUT mode
          0 - K-Type thermocouple, DUT mode

          Default Value:  0

          Valid Range: 0-2

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_THERMAL_CONSTANT] - used to configure the
          DUT thermal constant parameter.

          Default Value:  100

          Valid Range: 20-500

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_DUT_MODE] - used to configure the DUT mode. 0
          for Air mode; 1 for DUT mode

          Default Value:  0

          Valid Range: 0-1

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_LOW_TEMP_LIMIT] - used to configure the
          lower temperature limit

          Default Value:  -99

          Valid Range: -99 - +25

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_HIGH_TEMP_LIMIT] - used to configure the
          upper temperature limit

          Default Value:  225

          Valid Range: +25 - +225

          /*============================================================*/
          [TP04310_CONFIG_PARAM_AIR_TO_DUT_MAX_DIFFERENCE] - used to configure
          the maximum allowable difference between the air and DUT
          temperatures.

          Default Value:  300

          Valid Range: 10 - 300

      configurationParameterValue

          Variable Type       ViInt16

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_device_command

      ViStatus TP04310_write_device_command (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                             ViInt16 instrumentCommand,
                                             ViInt16 commandArgument);

  Purpose

      This function writes a device specific command to the TP04300 instrument.

      The following commands are supported:

      [TP04310_AIR_FLOW] - turns the main air flow On or Off, depending on the
      Command Argument value.

           Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the air flow off
                                = 1  to turn the air flow on

      [TP04310_HEAD] - moves the head Up or Down, depending on the Command
      Argument value.

           Use Command Argument = 0  to move the head Up
                                = 1  to move the head Down


      [TP04310_COMPRESSOR] - turns the compressor On or Off, depending on the
      Command Argument value.

           Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the compressor off
                                = 1  to turn the compressor on



  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      instrumentCommand

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control selects a device specific command for the TP04300
          instrument.

          The following commands are supported:

          [TP04310_AIR_FLOW] - turns the main air flow On or Off, depending on
          the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the air flow off
                                    = 1  to turn the air flow on

          [TP04310_HEAD] - moves the head Up or Down, depending on the Command
          Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to move the head Up
                                    = 1  to move the head Down

          [TP04310_COMPRESSOR] - turns the compressor On or Off, depending on
          the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the compressor off
                                    = 1  to turn the compressor on



      commandArgument

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control sets a device-specific command argument, as follows
          below for different commands.

          Default Value:  0

          [TP04300_AIR_FLOW] - turns the main air flow On or Off, depending on
          the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the air flow off
                                    = 1  to turn the air flow on

          [TP04300_TRICKLE_FLOW]  - turns the trickle air flow On or Off,
          depending on the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the trickle flow off
                                    = 1  to turn the trickle flow on

          [TP04300_HEAD] - moves the head Up or Down, depending on the Command
          Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to move the head Up
                                    = 1  to move the head Down

          [TP04300_HEAD_LOCK] - allows to lock/unlock the head position,
          depending on the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to unlock the head
                                    = 1  to lock the head

          [TP04300_COMPRESSOR] - turns the compressor On or Off, depending on
          the Command Argument value.

               Use Command Argument = 0  to turn the compressor off
                                    = 1  to turn the compressor on


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_ESE

      ViStatus TP04310_write_ESE (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                  ViInt16 ESE_register);

  Purpose

      This function configures the standard event status enable (mask)
      register.

      Valid Range: 0 - 255


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      ESE_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control configures the standard event status enable (mask)
          register.

          Valid Range: 0 - 255



  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_info

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_info (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                            ViInt16 setpointNumber,
                                            ViReal64 setpointTemperature,
                                            ViReal64 setpointWindow,
                                            ViInt16 setpointSoakTime,
                                            ViReal64 setpointRampRate);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint parameters, such as

      [Setpoint Number], for either control or configuration
      Valid range: 0-11 - for the Cycle Screen
                   0-2  - for the Operator Screen

      [Setpoint temperature]
      Valid Range:
                  -99.9 to 225.0 in the Cycle Screen for any setpoint
                   25.0 to 225.0 for setpoint #0 in Operator Screen
                   15.0 to  35.0 for setpoint #1 in Operator Screen
                  -99.9 to  25.0 for setpoint #2 in Operator Screen

      Note: Entering a value greater than maximum air temperature limit or
      less than minimum air temperature limit will cause "out of range error"


      [Setpoint temperature window]
      Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

      Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from
      the temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.

      [Setpoint the soak time]
      Valid Range: 0 to 9999

      [Setpoint ramp rate]
      Valid Range:  0 to 99.9 with 0.1C temperature resolution
              or  100 to 9999 with 1C temperature resolution


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointNumber

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control allows to select the setpoint, for either control or
          configuration

          Valid range: 0-11 - for the Cycle Screen
                       0-2  - for the Operator Screen

      setpointTemperature

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to set the currently selected setpoint's
          temperature.

          Valid Range:
                      -99.9 to 225.0 in the Cycle Screen for any setpoint
                       25.0 to 225.0 for setpoint #0 in Operator Screen
                       15.0 to  35.0 for setpoint #1 in Operator Screen
                      -99.9 to  25.0 for setpoint #2 in Operator Screen

          Note: Entering a value greater than maximum air temperature limit or
          less than minimum air temperature limit will cause "out of range
          error"

      setpointWindow

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to configure the currently selected setpoint's
          temperature window.

          Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

          Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from
          the temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.

      setpointSoakTime

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control is used to configure the soak time in seconds for the
          currently selected setpoint.

          Valid Range: 0 to 9999


      setpointRampRate

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to configure the ramp rate for the currently
          selected setpoint in Celsius per minute.

          Valid Range:  0 to 99.9 with 0.1C temperature resolution
                  or  100 to 9999 with 1C temperature resolution


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_number

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_number (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                              ViInt16 setpointNumber);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint number, for either control
      or configuration

      Valid range: 0-11 - for the Cycle Screen
                   0-2  - for the Operator Screen


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointNumber

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control allows to select the setpoint, for either control or
          configuration

          Valid range: 0-11 - for the Cycle Screen
                       0-2  - for the Operator Screen

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_ramp

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_ramp (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                            ViReal64 setpointRampRate);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint ramp rate.

      Valid Range:  0 to 99.9 with 0.1C temperature resolution
              or  100 to 9999 with 1C temperature resolution


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointRampRate

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to configure the ramp rate for the currently
          selected setpoint in Celsius per minute.

          Valid Range:  0 to 99.9 with 0.1C temperature resolution
                  or  100 to 9999 with 1C temperature resolution


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_soak

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_soak (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                            ViInt16 setpointSoakTime);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint soak time.

      Valid Range: 0 to 9999

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointSoakTime

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control is used to configure the soak time for the currently
          selected setpoint.

          Valid Range: 0 to 9999


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_temperature

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_temperature (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                                   ViReal64 setpointTemperature);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint temperature in Celsius.

      Valid Range: -150.0 to 225.0

      Note:Entering a value greater than the upper or lower than lower air
      temperature limit will cause out of range error.

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointTemperature

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to configure the setpoint temperature.

          Valid Range: -150.0 to 225.0

          Note:Entering a value greater than the upper or lower than lower air
          temperature limit will cause out of range error.

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_setpoint_window

      ViStatus TP04310_write_setpoint_window (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                              ViReal64 setpointWindow);

  Purpose

      This function allows to configure the setpoint window.
      Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

      Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from the
      temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      setpointWindow

          Variable Type       ViReal64

          This control is used to configure the currently selected setpoint's
          temperature window.

          Valid Range: 0.1 to 9.9

          Note: The window is the maximum positive or negative deviation from
          the temperature setpoint allowable for an "at temperature" condition.

  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_SRE

      ViStatus TP04310_write_SRE (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                  ViInt16 SRE_register);

  Purpose

      This function configures the service request enable (mask) register.

      Valid Range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - not used, always 0
      bit 1 - not used, always 0
      bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
      bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
      bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
      bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
      bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
      bit 7 - ready


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      SRE_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control configures the service request enable (mask) register.

          Valid Range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - not used, always 0
          bit 1 - not used, always 0
          bit 2 - device specific error (EROR) summary bit
          bit 3 - temperature event status (TESR) summmary bit
          bit 4 - message available (MAV), GPIB only
          bit 5 - standard event status (ESB) summary bit
          bit 6 - request for service (RQS)
          bit 7 - ready


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_write_TESE

      ViStatus TP04310_write_TESE (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                   ViInt16 TESE_register);

  Purpose

      This function configures the temperature event status enable (mask)
      register.

      Valid Range: 0 - 255

      bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
      bit 1 - not at temperature
      bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
      bit 3 - end of one cycle
      bit 4 - end of all cycles
      bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
      bit 6 - not used
      bit 7 - reserved


  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      TESE_register

          Variable Type       ViInt16

          This control configures the temperature event status enable (mask)
          register.

          Valid Range: 0 - 255

          bit 0 - at temperature (soak time has elapsed)
          bit 1 - not at temperature
          bit 2 - end of test (test time has elapsed)
          bit 3 - end of one cycle
          bit 4 - end of all cycles
          bit 5 - stopped cycling ("stop on fail" signal was received)
          bit 6 - not used
          bit 7 - reserved


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFC0102  Reset not supported - VI_WARN_NSUP_RESET
          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.

________________________________________________________________________________

  TP04310_writeInstrData

      ViStatus TP04310_writeInstrData (ViSession instrumentHandle,
                                       ViString writeBuffer);

  Purpose

      This function writes commands and queries to the instrument to modify
      parameters and query device settings.

  Parameter List

      instrumentHandle

          Variable Type       ViSession

          This control accepts the Instrument Handle returned by the Initialize
          function to select the desired instrument driver session.

          Default Value:  None

      writeBuffer

          Variable Type       ViString

          The user can use this control to send common commands and queries to
          the instrument. This control can also be used to write any valid
          command to the instrument.

          Default Value:  "*RST"

          Notes:

          (1) The command or query to be sent to the instrument may be a
          literal enclosed in double quotes i.e. "*RST" or may be contained in
          a variable of type string.


  Return Value

          This control contains the status code returned by the function call.

          Status Codes:

          Status    Description
          -------------------------------------------------
                 0  No error (the call was successful).

          3FFF0005  The specified termination character was read.
          3FFF0006  The specified number of bytes was read.

          BFFF0000  Miscellaneous or system error occurred.
          BFFF000E  Invalid session handle.
          BFFF0015  Timeout occurred before operation could complete.
          BFFF0034  Violation of raw write protocol occurred.
          BFFF0035  Violation of raw read protocol occurred.
          BFFF0036  Device reported an output protocol error.
          BFFF0037  Device reported an input protocol error.
          BFFF0038  Bus error occurred during transfer.
          BFFF003A  Invalid setup (attributes are not consistent).
          BFFF005F  No listeners condition was detected.
          BFFF0060  This interface is not the controller in charge.
          BFFF0067  Operation is not supported on this session.
